Text: Read this first before you watch how Kurtzmann and Orci destroy it.

So...I'm not sure this is working. The "finished" .cbr files aren't displaying. Only 00 and 01 display. The rest go to a blank white display where no pages can be identified. No error message, just blankness...
I just opened the copy I d/l'ed and they all work.  Not sure what's going on with your files comixscholar...
Nevermind. I had the old torrent still downloading when I connected to this one. It merged the files and messed them up. I deleted then redownloaded this. Everything is fine now.
Can you post all the "Armageddon 2001" Annuals and bookends, and miniseries (alien agenda) from DC for 1991?

no offense intended but this is not the atlantis rising that was optioned to be the basis of a movie. it wasn't the marvel comics crossover they bought the rights to turn into a movie, it was an indy comic. sorry!
